entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 7:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
